question: I have been losing weight which could be due to stress, but there are other factors that lead me to think maybe I am getting or already have it. my metabolism is definitely different. I am 87 lbs and 5 foot so have a fast metabolism but it's weird lately. I eat and I eat and I don't gain and also I have been getting indigestion more too. Can you give me any answers?
title: I think I could be developing diabetes
